item.title: Seneca, On saving time
item.description: While browsing random wikipedia articles, I came across an interesting piece of work called “Moral Letters to Lucilius by Seneca” ðŸ”— This form of writing is called Epistles and is defined as a poem or other literary work in the form of a letter or series of letters Written by the Roman philosopher Seneca to Lucilius who was apparently a friend. There are total 124 such letters and I just read and made some notes on the first one - On saving time.
